member.summary: Removes the expired refresh tokens.
member.param: The time before the tokens are expired
member.returns: True, if at least one token removed, otherwise False.

member.summary: Removes the refresh token by user name and keys.
member.returns: True, if at least one token removed, otherwise False.

member.summary: Generates a new token.
member.param: Indicates, when the token will be activated.
The secondary keys to identify a token.

member.name: M:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtManagementService.Validate(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Forge.Security.Jwt.Shared.Service.Models.JwtKeyValuePair})
member.summary: Validate the specified access and refresh tokens.
member.param: The time when the refresh token will be active
member.returns: True, if the tokens are valid, otherwise False.

member.summary: Generates new access and refresh tokens
member.param: The time when the refresh token will be active
The secondary keys to identify the refresh token

member.name: T:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration for token provider

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.Secret
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique secret information to generate access tokens.
member.value: The secret value. A GUID is a goog choice.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.Issuer
member.summary: Gets or sets the issuer.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.Audience
member.summary: Gets or sets the audience.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.AccessTokenExpirationInMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token expiration in minutes.
member.value: The access token expiration in minutes. Default is 10 minutes.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.RefreshTokenExpirationInMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the refresh token expiration in minutes.
member.value: The refresh token expiration in minutes. Default is 10 minutes.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.ValidateIssuer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether issuer will be validated. Do not turn it off, if False, it decreases the secuity level.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.ValidateIssuerSigningKey
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [validate issuer signing key]. Do not turn it off, if False, it decreases the secuity level.
member.value: true if [validate issuer signing key]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.ValidateAudience
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [validate audience]. Do not turn it off, if False, it decreases the secuity level.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.ValidateLifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [validate lifetime]. Do not turn it off, if False, it decreases the secuity level.

member.name: P:Forge.Security.Jwt.Service.JwtTokenConfiguration.ClockSkewInMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the clock skew in minutes. Do not turn it off, if False, it decreases the secuity level.
